synopsis.text:
Austria, 1625. A young man named D'Artagnan, armed with his father's sword and a letter of introduction, leaves his grandparents' home in Gascogne to pursue his dream of becoming a musketeer in the bustling city of Paris. Upon his arrival, D'Artagnan unintentionally offends three musketeers - Porthos, Aramis, and Athos. However, their disagreement is quickly put aside when they join forces to fend off an attack by the Cardinal's guards. Impressed by D'Artagnan's bravery, the trio befriends him, and together, they embark on a thrilling adventure across France and England.

Their mission: to thwart the cunning plans of Cardinal Richelieu and protect Queen Anne of Austria's reputation. Along the way, they encounter a mysterious and beautiful spy known only as Milady, who seeks revenge on the four friends and will stop at nothing to achieve her goals. As they navigate the treacherous waters of court intrigue and political power plays, D'Artagnan and his newfound companions must prove their worth as musketeers and protect their country from the looming threat of war. Join them on their epic journey filled with action, adventure, and romance in this thrilling anime adaptation of the classic tale, The Three Musketeers.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
